channel.title: Restarted Router Now It Won't Go Up
channel.description: I had to restart my router. and now i can't get anyone on my server.... and ideas?? I'm on a Netgear Router... THANKS SOOOOOOO MUCH!

item.title: Restarted Router Now It Won't Go Up
item.dc:creator: @adamator5 adamator5
item.description:
@adamator5 wrote:

This is a brief explanation, you go to http://www.portforward.com/, scroll down, and it shud show ur ip adress, put that in your adress bar, go to the website, go down left and click port forwarding, port triggering.add you server as a dns server. your ip adress that you put in the adress bar.and port range 43594-43594.
Then save.
then go to your firewall settings, add the port to the list as TCP
save it…
Set your no-ip to normal, make sure you havent changed anything, and when u enter your ip in no-ip, to create it, make sure it is the ip that your put in your adress bar to get to the port forwarding website… anything i missed, coz after that it shud work.
any more info
adscape@hotmail.co.uk

Read full topic
item.source: Restarted Router Now It Won't Go Up

I have no idea but I reset my router twice, my friend suggested using static ip which I did but didn’t work so I reset my router. I have linksys :\ If this gets answered, I’ll get an answer too
